entry.name: ajaxStart
entry.title: .ajaxStart()
entry.desc: Register a handler to be called when the first Ajax request begins. This is an Ajax Event.

longdesc.p: Whenever an Ajax request is about to be sent, jQuery checks whether there are any other outstanding Ajax requests. If none are in progress, jQuery triggers the ajaxStart event. Any and all handlers that have been registered with the .ajaxStart() method are executed at this time.
